class.name: VisualShaderNodeVectorCompose
class.brief_description: Composes a [Vector2], [Vector3] or 4D vector (represented as a [Quaternion]) from scalars within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Creates a [code]vec2[/code], [code]vec3[/code] or [code]vec4[/code] using scalar values that can be provided from separate inputs.
